document_data.name: Flan Hawser
document_data.mainbody:
'''Flan Hawser''' was a Seawind of [[Umberlee]], a member of the Bitch Queen's [[Church of Umberlee|clergy]] under Flood Tide [[Allandra Grey]] of the [[Water Queen's House]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I long for such a beautiful death! Umberlee will deliver us all!''|Seawind Flan Hawser}}
document_data.Description: Flan Hawser was a [[human]] woman with red hair and a reddish-dark skin tone. She had watery blue eyes and bore an aquamarine [[tattoo]] depicting a flock of [[bird]]s on her left cheekbone.
document_data.Posessions: Flan's Seawind uniform was a set of skin-tight ceremonial [[chainmail]] dress with light pauldrons and decorative [[bracer]]s. Her weapon of choice was heavy [[crossbow]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during the [[Absolute crisis]], Seawind Flan Hawser was among the church's members who performed the ceremonies and sang hymns in praise of the Bitch Queen. She was alongside Flood Tide Allandra Grey and other priestesses during [[Holli Dylford]]'s last rites. The recently perished priestess perished while swimming in Baldur's Gate's [[Gray Harbor]], the death Seawind Hawser thought to be beautiful.
